name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Ephraim;Excuse me.|I wanted to thank the lady that was here for your hospitality earlier.
speak;Villager Old Woman 1;Ah, you just missed her.|That mercenary woman gave me the chills...

speak;Villager Old Woman 1;Aye, a swordswoman.|Cold eyes, that one. Barely says a word.|She's been passing through now and again.|Always heading east, toward the mountain pass.|I think she's looking for work...or maybe trouble.|Hard to tell with her type.

speak;Villager Old Woman 1;She's got skill, I'll give her that.|Moves like a shadow, quiet as the grave.|But there's something sad about her, I think.|Like she's searching for something she can't quite find.|You be careful if you cross paths with her, young man.|Mercenaries follow the coin, and coin leads to battlefields.
speak;Ephraim;I appreciate the warning. I'll keep an eye out.
